ComicInfo.Series: Rising Stars: Voices of the Dead
ComicInfo.Summary: Lionel Zerb struggles with the weight of the psychic world as he tries to determine what the vortex within the House on Stansbury Lane really wants from him or from anyone, dead or alive. When he finally makes contact, Lionel is asked by a dark entity within the vortex to sacrifice the only thing he has ever loved. Will Lionel give up his happiness in exchange for someone else's greater destiny?
ComicInfo.Title: Deals with Karma
